main event: Lights were seen in the sky over Penbrook, Pennsylvania, on the evenings of 19-21 May 1952, described as reddish in color, leaving red trails, and hovering.
interesting points: The object was observed from the ground and air,The sighting took place on multiple nights,The lights were reported to hover and dart in the sky,Investigations suggested the phenomena were likely conventional aircraft,The Air National Guard had active fighter aircraft in the area during the observed times.
witness description: The report includes information from an unidentified witness.
